ing: salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "Take one part vinegar, two parts peach preserves, three parts chicken broth, and seasonings: boil, reduce, and serve to create this beautiful sauce."
ins: Whisk chicken broth, peach preserves, sherry vinegar, Chinese five-spice powder, and cayenne pepper in a saucepan over medium-high heat. Bring to a boil; cook until reduced and slightly thickened, 5 minutes. Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
